thread.title: The Best Chocolate for Your Zodiac Sign — Your Chocolate Horoscope
thread.title_full: The Best Chocolate for Your Zodiac Sign — Your Chocolate Horoscope

author: The AstroTwins
title: The Best Chocolate for Your Zodiac Sign — Your Chocolate Horoscope
text:
Share 
Horoscopes and … chocolate? Now you've heard it all, right? But hey, each zodiac sign has a distinct set of personality traits — and believe it or not, there's a chocolate recipe out there to match each one. So here's some cacao-dipped cosmic insight into the chocolate that most resembles your astrological profile. (Image credit: Kelli Foster ) ARIES (March 21 to April 19): Brownies 
Daring Aries are adventurous in the physical world, but not so much with food. As the first sign of the zodiac, you have childlike spirits and tend to gravitate toward "kid" foods like chicken fingers and fries when you're indulging. 
Brownies, a childhood favorite, will never fail to satisfy your sweet tooth after a long day of conquests. And because you're impatient and always on the go, you can grab a square and eat it in your car or walking down the street — you just might have to stop and find some milk along the way.
